text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi If @PMOIndia @narendramodi is planning to open a partial or full lockdown of some states or cities, then its a bad decision. Because even if one #Coronavirus #Covid19 patient in those area remain undetected,it can cause major issue @WHO @DrTedros @BBCWorld @ndtv @STcom @AFP
